
final modifier

Suggested change

timeline.body:
Consistency with other log messages
```suggestion
      LOG.warn("Wait for death of process "{} was interrupted", name, e);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Consistency with other log messages

Suggested change
LOG.warn("Wait for death of process " + name + " was interrupted", e);
LOG.warn("Wait for death of process "{} was interrupted", name, e);
